data.englishTranslation: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have mercy on them.
data.transliteration: Allaahumma baarik lahum feemaa razaqtahum, waghfir lahum warhamhum.
data.arabicVerse: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِيمَا رَزَقْتَهُمْ، وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ
